CFBundleVersion $(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER) LSRequiresIPhoneOS
UILaunchStoryboardName LaunchScreen UIMainStoryboardFile Main UISupportedInterfaceOrientations

NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription This app needs access to your photo library to allow you to select a background image for your trip. NSCameraUsageDescription This app needs access to your camera to allow you to take a background image for your trip. NSMicrophoneUsageDescription This app needs access to your microphone if you take a video with the camera for your trip. ``` Add these inside the main `` tag in `Info.plist`.
